text: 1.19: FG 9.20; 18.5Gu Sairas gu Timotin kov, nza nden rɨgar kav, nza Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun nde suaŋgi. Mba buna vhuueŋ ne Fhe Bakɨmen Kam Zisas Krais bun nzuai kameŋ ma. Nde kaŋgi, Zisas Krais, “Ahaŋ” gum “Fhuvara” ndi ndɨɨi guma fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Krais, ana zazera “Ahaŋ” rɨgi guma ma.
